price: Да су они богови, не би у Пакао ушли, и сви ће у њему вечно да бораве.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
